post.title: Cashing in on Promises Kept
post.author: abelgaxiola
post.excerpt: Just want to say that it pays to keep a promise – a New Year’s resolution in my case – and that ridding a road bike instead of a mountain bike makes all the difference in the world.
post.content:
Just want to say that it pays to keep a promise – a New Year’s resolution in my case – and that ridding a road bike instead of a mountain bike makes all the difference in the world.  It is also said that a picture is worth a thousand words; so I give you the following picture:


In case you didn’t notice: the trophy in my right hand is for first place; the trophy on my left is my wife.  I don’t know the exact time it took me to ride the sixty mile distance but whatever it was it was good enough to beat the others.

Not done yet, I still have to work on my technical skills and my spiritual growth.  I’m starting to realize that keeping a promise is a full time job.
